details.body: A 30% time cost to the sales team in talking to new users and recommending the right product configuration for them.
A feature that asks the user a series of questions to understand the nature of their business and uses their responses to offer a recommendation for what plan would be best suited to their needs.
The time spent by the sales team in performing this task dropped down to around 15%.

There was no quick and easy way for new users to try the ID verification product. They had to choose and sign up for a plan to be able to do this, causing a large number of them to abandon the product altogether
A product demo modal that renders on the home page of the client portal right after a user creates an account and is logged in, allowing them to try the product.
We saw a significant uptick in the number of new users engaging with the product and discussing pricing options with the sales team.
Numerous user complaints (via support tickets) about having to wait too long to get "verified" via manual review after submitting their ID without a completion time estimate.
A progress tracker that reflects the status of the manual review of their ID in real-time.
This dramatically reduced the number of user complaints via support tickets by 80% and increased the weekly number of "cleared" users by 6%.
Slow resolution of support tickets regarding 'errors' due to missing details about the error.
A feature that records all errors encountered by a user and retrieves the most recent one from an endpoint to (optionally) adds it to the support ticket submitted by the user.
About 75% of error tickets received contained details about the error, allowing the support team to resolve them much faster.
38% of users were abandoning the verification process when asked to submit their ID.

A section on the FAQ page (accessible from the omnipresent 'Learn More' link) highlighting the company's commitment towards protecting users' private data through meaningful messaging and custom icons representing compliance with various governmental privacy regulations.
The amount of users abandoning the process at this step decreased by 14% in 3 months.
Lots of new users were getting lost in the dashboard, analytics showed random navigation behavior and a delay in finding the feature most suites to their needs.
A home page we can drop users on when they signup and login, summarizing the platform and what they can do with it.
New users found what they were looking for a lot quicker and were navigating the dashboard a lot more consistently. We were able to identify patterns which led to some awesome UX improvements.
Investors needed a way to digitally verify ownership of their digital wallets for legal compliance in order to avoid losing their investments.

I conducted user interviews, usability tests and led the design and front end development for the addition of new steps to the identity verification workflow that verify each user's ownership of their wallets and tie it to their identity.

A 95% conversion rate; meaning thousands of users used the front end system I designed and developed out of which 95% of users successfully completed the process and were able to keep their investments.
The manual process of creating and configuring new user accounts was wasting the the sales and development teams' valuable time and yielded fewer new accounts created monthly.
I worked with a backend engineer to develop a signup flow, automating account creation and configuration and allowing new users to signup without needing our assistance.
This increased the number of new accounts created monthly by 33% and saved the sales and development teams a significant amount of time for other important work.
Customers needed a way to monitor all security data for each facility in their organization in one place for security purposes
I worked with a product manager and a backend engineer to build a 'Facility' page with widgets showing key data such as the budget, threat assessment and overall 'Quill Score'.
This enabled customers to stay up to date on the security status for each facility without having to gather data from multiple sources.
